item.description:
The beautiful park is getting greener as the weather warms up. The trees are in leaf at last. Who knows, there may even be rabbits to chase! At least, Hope springs eternal in Rufus's heart that there will.

Rain will cancel this meetup.

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Enjoy a May romp around Macdonald Park along the Mystic River
